modName: Steel Quiver mesh and texture replacer
summary: changes the hideous and cartoonish steel quiver
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/28qus9g.jpg[/img]
[center][B]
[size=4]by AurelioMagherelli[/B]
     [/size][/center]


[size=3]
I always hated the steel quiver.
It looks silly and cartoonish.
Unfortunately steel arrows are abudant throughout the game, especially at low-mid levels.
So I messed around with the ancient nord and steel meshes/textures.
This is the result.

[color=d81550][b]TWO VERSIONS:[/b][/color]

[b]No arrows FINAL[/b]
Only changes the quiver, default steel arrows
[b]With arrows v5[/b]
Changes both quiver and arrows(to modified ancient nord arrows)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE v2-FINAL
Steel band resolution and colour reduced to match other textures
New arrows more smooth and less ruined
Plastic wrap shine adjusted to good levels especially on wood
Fixed arrows not showing the correct mesh once shot
Fixed arrows/no arrows version mixup
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


WARNING

It replaces the vanilla steel quiver and/or arrows (depends on the version you choose)
IT DOES NOT replace or alter the regular ancient nord quiver and arrows in any way.
Basically now you have an ancient version  and a modern steel one(ancient nord-steel), just like for the steel armor (nordhero/draugr vanilla armor and nord steel armor).

WARNING 2
Download only if you don\'t like the default steel arrow quiver.
As of now the mod isn\'t an improvement over it, just a replacer.



INSTALL
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Drop the folders in your Skyrim/Data.

UNINSTALL
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Delete the following:
 \\Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\nordhero:
nordheroarrows.dds
nordheroarrows_n.dds
nordheroarrows_m.dds

and 
\\Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\steel:
steelarrow.nif
steelarrowflight.nif
[/size]

CREDITS
Luppov for quiver-only mesh.
author: Aurelio Magherelli
